EmailTemplate.name: RE: Estimates and MBO Information (1363904975.0)
EmailTemplate.subject: RE: Estimates and MBO Information (1363904975.0)
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
- - - - Clean false false false EN-US X-NONE X-NONE Hi Patrick, Please let me know if you have any other questions about this but I have attached the estimates as requested. I apologize I was unable to take your calls earlier but I was on a conference call for almost 2 hours and now have to run out of the office, but will call you tomorrow morning to talk about the next steps with your client. Have a great evening, Nicolette From: Patrick Windsor II [mailto:patrick@windsorandjordan.com] Sent: Thursday, March 21, 2013 12:25 PM To: Nicolette Taylor Subject: Re: Estimates and MBO Information Nicole,
Thank you for the information provided, I have a request, could you run this report again for the following numbers:COBRA costs
$1,190.22 HSA Family health plan $ 141.71 Family dental plan $ 26.64 Admin Fee
$1,358.57 TotalAnd hourly rates of 50/hr, 55/hr & 60/hr....I really appreciate your help...Regards,
Patrick A. Windsor II Office: 630-524-2627 Mobile: 630-417-2412 Fax: 630-563-1425 On Wed, Mar 20, 2013 at 3:20 PM, Nicolette Taylor <ntaylor@mbopartners.com <mailto:ntaylor@mbopartners.com>> wrote:Hi Patrick, It was a pleasure speaking with you today! I’ve enclosed a few resources that you might find helpful as discussed: - You can view all the information we spoke over the phone about our program by going here <http://mkto-l0128.com/track?t=c&&&&http://info.mbopartners.com/advisor-info-n-taylor.html?mkt_tok=2xUAKZjCa1BNp0514NyOK6fpjDrSe5assbNvDfbonMwx1CIUGIalUg%3D%3D>. This is an example of a template email I would send to a new client that includes our agreement: My name is Nicolette Taylor a Consultant Services Advisor at MBO Partners. Per the introduction from Patrick, I wanted to reach out and provide some information on the MBO Program. On behalf of everyone here at MBO Partners, we look forward to working with your firm. MBO Partners caters to two markets. Our first service is designed for independent consultants and small businesses <http://mkto-l0128.com/track?t=c&&&&http://www.mbopartners.com/?mkt_tok=2xUAKZjCa1BNp0514NyOK6fpjDrSe5assbNvDfbonMwx1CIUGIalUg%3D%3D#howwehelp> who choose to plug into our MBO Services Cloud to make it easier for them to work with their clients. We take care of all the back office administrative, HR, regulatory and financial issues so they can stay focused on delivering on their services. The second is how we help enterprise organizations engage more efficiently and safely with their contract workforce <http://mkto-l0128.com/track?t=c&&&&http://www.mboenterprise.com/how-we-help?mkt_tok=2xUAKZjCa1BNp0514NyOK6fpjDrSe5assbNvDfbonMwx1CIUGIalUg%3D%3D>. We have also put together a short one page collateral <http://mkto-l0128.com/track?t=c&&&&http://info.mbopartners.com/rs/mbo/images/MBO_Partners_Introduction.pdf?mkt_tok=2xUAKZjCa1BNp0514NyOK6fpjDrSe5assbNvDfbonMwx1CIUGIalUg%3D%3D> that explains how we work and the markets we serve. The following links provide our standard agreement <http://mkto-l0128.com/track?t=c&&&&http://info.mbopartners.com/rs/mbo/images/MBO_Exec_MSA_Template.pdf?mkt_tok=2xUAKZjCa1BNp0514NyOK6fpjDrSe5assbNvDfbonMwx1CIUGIalUg%3D%3D> and statement of work <http://mkto-l0128.com/track?t=c&&&&http://info.mbopartners.com/rs/mbo/images/MBO_Exec_SOW.pdf?mkt_tok=2xUAKZjCa1BNp0514NyOK6fpjDrSe5assbNvDfbonMwx1CIUGIalUg%3D%3D> we use when engaging our Associates with their clients. Please review and complete it, and return a signed copy to me. If you or Greg have any questions for me please do not hesitate to reach out. Thanks again, and I look forward to working with you! If you have any questions, feel free to reach out to me directly or schedule a convenient time for you using my online schedule <http://mkto-l0128.com/track?t=c&&&&https://my.timedriver.com/9TGRK?mkt_tok=2xUAKZjCa1BNp0514NyOK6fpjDrSe5assbNvDfbonMwx1CIUGIalUg%3D%3D>. I look forward to speaking with you again soon! Have a great day, Nicolette___________________________________Nicolette TaylorConsultant Services AdvisorMBO Partners t: 703.793.6281 <tel:703.793.6281>f: 703.793.6456 <tel:703.793.6456>e: ntaylor@mbopartners.com <http://mkto-l0128.com/track?t=c&&&&bbentley@mbopartners.com?mkt_tok=2xUAKZjCa1BNp0514NyOK6fpjDrSe5assbNvDfbonMwx1CIUGIalUg%3D%3D>w: www.mbopartners.com <http://mkto-l0128.com/track?t=c&&&&http://www.mbopartners.com/?mkt_tok=2xUAKZjCa1BNp0514NyOK6fpjDrSe5assbNvDfbonMwx1CIUGIalUg%3D%3D> Notice: This email and any files transmitted with it are confidential. They are intended solely for the use of the individual addressed. If you have received this email in error please notify postmaster@mbopartners.com <http://mkto-l0128.com/track?t=c&&&&mailto:postmaster@mbopartners.com?mkt_tok=2xUAKZjCa1BNp0514NyOK6fpjDrSe5assbNvDfbonMwx1CIUGIalUg%3D%3D> and permanently delete the e-mail and files. We’ve got some serious perks you’re eligible to win when you refer a friend <http://mkto-l0128.com/track?t=c&&&&http://referral.mbopartners.com/referral-program?r=taylor&mkt_tok=2xUAKZjCa1BNp0514NyOK6fpjDrSe5assbNvDfbonMwx1CIUGIalUg%3D%3D> to MBO Partners! Ask me about them.
